title: posed to human life and public health by the spread of Covid19, and to the matters specified in section 31A(2) of that Act,
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the Health Act 1947 (Fixed Payment Notice and 
Dwelling Event Provisions) (Covid-19) Regulations 2021 ( S.I. No. 170 of 
2021 ) to provide for certain penal provisions in the Health Act 1947 (Section 
31A - Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) Regulations 2021 ( S.I. No. 168 of 
2021 ) to be fixed penalty and/or dwelling event provisions.
